item.title: Using the Terminal for Site Bay WordPress Hosting

item.title: how-to-set-sitebay-environment-variables
item.description: Let’s remake the article for Site Bay Powerful WordPress hosting, making it relatable and straightforward. We’ll focus on setting and using environment variables in the context of Site Bay, ensuring it’s clear and accessible for everyone, especially those new to WordPress hosting on Kubernetes platforms.
